title: uru tuNaiyAi irundu
sahitya:
uru tuNaiyAi irundu udaviDuvAi enrum tirupparamkunram tigazh murugA enranidu


anupallavi

  sharaNamenak-kUriyun sannidhi sErum en kurai anaittum tIra krpai kUrum parivODu


caraNam    cittam enadai vIN cintanaiyil seluttum pittu ennai enrumE piDittu ATTiDAmal 
nittam un nAmattai ninaittu nilaittiDum bhaktip-paravashattai attanE yAn aDaiya
